page.title: 01Dovercourt - Holiday Resort
page.content: {Dovercourt has long stretches of {clean,golden sands and safe water.}It is free of the more obvious commercialism but has many attractions especially for children. There is a boating lake,a model yacht pond,a small amusement arcade,a roller-skating rink, putting green and tennis courts.A new indoor swimming pool opened in 1984. There is a golf course and sailing clubs. There are plenty of safe places for games and space to stroll and enjoy the view. From almost any point on the peninsula you can see a wide range of sea-going craft: fishing boats,yachts,trawlers,tug boats, Trinity House launches: sometimes old Thames sailing barges and always the impressive continental ferries.
